name: Perfect Plan
description: Perfect Plan is a single-player first person shooting game. The game based on a simple plot of two pals Tom & Bill planning to steal a multi million dollar formula. However, their path are riddled with many obstacles and challenges to overcome.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel I5-2500K, AMD FX-8120 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB of Video Memory & NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650, AMD Radeon HD7870 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel I7-3770, AMD FX 8350 4.0 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 4GB of Video Memory & NVIDIA Geforce GTX 780 or GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon R9 290X DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
